participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly, always eager to try new recipes and share them with friends.
participant_1.background: I like to make cakes. I like the internet. I am a vegetarian. My favorite music is country. I have a new job.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and observant, I find inspiration in nature and enjoy capturing it through my art.
participant_2.background: I am a vegan. I like to paint. I traveled around the world in a boat. I have 23 cats at home.
